sentences.en: Actual secret rendezvous need not be settled till later.
sentences.cn: 实际秘密会晤地点待以后再定.

sentences.en: He made a rendezvous with his girlfriend.
I had almost decided to keep my rendezvous with Tony.
sentences.cn: 我差不多已经决定如约和托尼见面了。

sentences.en: It was a public lounge and a rendezvous.
sentences.cn: 这地方是公众逍遥和集合的地方.

sentences.en: It was the first occasion when they had both found it possible to keep a rendezvous.
sentences.cn: 他们两人都能赴约，这还是头一遭。

sentences.en: It's a rendezvous for writers, artists and all kinds of celebrities.
sentences.cn: 那是作家, 艺术家和各种名流聚会的地方.

sentences.en: She made the rendezvous with only minutes to spare.
sentences.cn: 她还差几分钟时才来赴约.

sentences.en: She wondered where they were going to rendezvous afterwards.
sentences.cn: 她想知道之后他们要去哪里约会。

sentences.en: The booster was Saturn C - 3 and the key technique was lunar orbit rendezvous.
sentences.cn: 采用萨杜恩C -3 运载火箭,关键技术是月球轨道会合.

sentences.en: The cafe is a popular rendezvous for young lovers.
sentences.cn: 这个咖啡馆是年轻恋人的约会圣地.

sentences.en: The platoon made its way to the pre - arranged rendezvous in the desert.
sentences.cn: 这个排向事先约定的沙漠中的会合点进发.

sentences.en: Their rendezvous would be the Penta Hotel at Heathrow Airport.
sentences.cn: 他们将在希思罗机场的五角饭店碰面。

sentences.en: This cafe is a rendezvous for writers and artists.
sentences.cn: 这家小餐馆是作家和艺术家经常聚会的地方.

sentences.en: This is one of the great rendezvous of London for artists.
sentences.cn: 这是伦敦最大的艺术家云集地之一.

sentences.en: Three flights then developed and demonstrated rendezvous and docking techniques with Agena as target.
sentences.cn: 还有三次是开发和演示飞船与阿金纳会合和对接技术.

trans.tran_cn: 约会，约会的地点，集结地
trans.tran_en: an arrangement to meet someone at a particular time and place, often secretly
to meet someone at a time or place that was arranged earlier
